org.miller.gwt.client.sound
Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
  org.miller.gwt.client.sound.SoundManager

public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object

SoundManager is created as a singleton and must be retrieved using getInstance(). SoundManager controls all playback functionality including play, stop, resume, pause, setting position and so forth. DefaultOptions are used to set the default options on every SMSound object created by SoundManager. Any option or callback set under DefaultOptions will be set for every call to play or createSound.

Author:
JMILLER
